item.description:
Here is another opportunity for people going on the Montreal trip to meet each other and maybe find someone to carpool with. It is also a good time to ask any questions or make suggestions for the trip.

We will also be celebrating a birthday at this event, so everyone is welcome to join us! After dinner at Lemongrass we will probably go somewhere nearby for (more) drinks.
item.name: birthday party and Montreal get-together
